required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study To Evaluate The Response To Enbrel And The Impact Of Rheumatoid Factor(RF) And Anti-Cyclic Citrullinated Peptide(Anti-CCP) In Rheumatoid Arthritis(RA) Patients
clinical_study.official_title: The Impact Of RF, And Anti-CCP On RA Patients In Response To Etanercept

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to evaluate available local data in Iraqi patients with rheumatoid arthritis on Enbrel treatment with regards to the impact of Rheumatoid factor and Anti-cyclic citrullinated peptide using data from the Baghdad Teaching Hospital registry.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean Change from base line in the Disease Activity Score 28 (DAS28) for patients with moderate to severe RA with positive RF and ACCP treated with etanercept
primary_outcome.description: The assessment of efficacy of etanercept in patients with moderate to severe RA with positive RF and ACCP by the change of DAS28 from baseline to the end of the study.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean Change from base line in the Clinical Disease Activity Index (CDAI) for patients with moderate to severe RA with positive RF and ACCP treated with etanercept
primary_outcome.description: The assessment of efficacy of etanercept in patients with moderate to severe RA with positive RF and ACCP by the change of CDAI from baseline to the end of the study.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean Change from base line in the Disease Activity Score 28 (DAS28) for patients with moderate to severe RA with negative RF and ACCP treated with etanercept
primary_outcome.description: The assessment of efficacy of etanercept in patients with moderate to severe RA with negative RF and ACCP by the change of DAS28 from baseline to the end of the study.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean Change from base line in the Clinical Disease Activity Index (CDAI) for patients with moderate to severe RA with negative RF and ACCP treated with etanercept
primary_outcome.description: The assessment of efficacy of etanercept in patients with moderate to severe RA with negative RF and ACCP by the change of CDAI from baseline to the end of the study.

arm_group.description: Iraqi patients with rheumatoid arthritis that received Enbrel as treatment for disease

intervention.description: As provided in real world practice

study_pop.textblock: Patients data from the local registry at the Baghdad Teaching Hospital registry.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosed RA patients.
-â‰¥18 years of age
- Did not receive previous another biological treatment
Exclusion Criteria:
- Had previous biological treatment
- Use of etanercept for less than 1 year

patient_data.ipd_description: Pfizer will provide access to individual de-identified participant data and related study documents (e.g. protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan (SAP), Clinical Study Report (CSR)) upon request from qualified researchers, and subject to certain criteria, conditions, and exceptions. Further details on Pfizer's data sharing criteria and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.pfizer.com/science/clinical_trials/trial_data_and_results/data_requests.
